record.title: THE JOURNAL
record.chair: Pursuant to clause 8 of rule XX, the unfinished business is the question on agreeing to the Speaker's approval of the Journal.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mrs.
speaking-unknown-id.name: TAUSCHER
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Ms.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SCHMIDT
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I missed the last vote due to an appointment. Had I been present I would have voted "no" on the Journal.
